bibl.title: Letter from Clarence P. Jones to Howard A. Kelly, December 10, 1928

div1.p: Jones thanks Kelly for the book on Walter Reed. He will send photographs of Belroi and relate the status of restoration funding.

div1.head: Letter from Clarence P. Jones to Howard A. Kelly, December 10, 1928
div1.opener:
E. C. S. TALIAFERRO, M. D., CHAIRMAN
NORFOLK, VA.
CLARENCE PORTER JONES, M. D.,
NEWPORT NEWS, VA.
GREER BAUGHMAN, M. D.,
RICHMOND, VA.
GARNETT NELSON, M. D.,
RICHMOND, VA.
H. S. HEDGES, M. D.,
CHARLOTTESVILLE, VA.
Walter Reed Commission
OF THE
Medical Society of Virginia
FOR
ENCOURAGEMENT OF RESEARCH
FROM DR. HOWARD A. KELLY
Newport News, Va.
12/10/28
Dr. Howard A Kelly,
1406 Eutaw Place,
Batto,Md.
My dear Doctor Kelly:-
div1.p:
Your very kind letter also a copy of your
work on Walter Reed reached me today. I am very grateful to you
for the same and I shall enjoy reading it. Enclose a photo of
Belroi as it looked 2 yrs. ago when we began its restoration and
as it looks today. This property is bought and paid for and is
held by the Commission for the Medical Society of Virginia. We
have raised nearly three thousand dollars from doctors (almost
entirely) and have paid all the debt but about $70.00. We are now
endeavering to raise several thousand dollars more to put a
permanant fence, erect the log kitchen and to obtain some furni-
ture of the period. Incidentally we are trying to encourage re-
search by telling the story of Walter Reed in every school room
in America.

I should be glad to have you visit Belroi,
and I sincerely appreciate your interest in the same

E. C. S. TALIAFERRO, M. D., CHAIRMAN
NORFOLK, VA.

CLARENCE PORTER JONES, M. D.,
NEWPORT NEWS, VA.

GREER BAUGHMAN, M. D.,
RICHMOND, VA.

GARNETT NELSON, M. D.,
RICHMOND, VA.

H. S. HEDGES, M. D.,
CHARLOTTESVILLE, VA.

Walter Reed Commission
OF THE
Medical Society of Virginia
FOR
ENCOURAGEMENT OF RESEARCH

I also feel very much honored at making your acquaintance
last week.
div1.closer:
Yours cordially Clarence Porter Jones
Secy & Treas.
W. R. Memorial Association. CPJ/F.
